msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'ea3-07'.

author: horwat
msg: Fix startRow indexing. Allow startRow and maxRows to take EL expressions.

author: horwat
msg: The standard taglib JavascriptExpressionEvaluator implementation depended on public but non-documented Rhino classes to unwrap objects. This patch removes the dependency on NativeString and NativeBoolean.

author: luehe
msg: Removed workaround that is no longer needed now that
